message.content:
I need to identify and extract the amount of profit after all expenses have been deducted, along with 5 component sub-items from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that the final profit figure after all deductions is the "Net Profit" of 1903401.82 on 2024-02-05.

For the 5 component sub-items that contribute to this calculation, I'll select key items from the statement:

1. Total Revenue: 4879769.51 (the starting point of the income statement)
2. Cost of Goods Sold: 2018000.00 (direct costs)
3. Total Expenses: 727658.81 (combined operating expenses)
4. Interest Income: 13279.60 (additional income)
5. Tax Expense: 243988.48 (final deduction before net profit)

Let me verify this calculation:
Total Revenue (4879769.51) - Cost of Goods Sold (2018000.00) - Total Expenses (727658.81) + Interest Income (13279.60) - Tax Expense (243988.48) = 1903401.82

This confirms that the Net Profit is 1903401.82 and the 5 component sub-items are valid.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1903401.82', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '4879769.51', 'sub_item value2': '2018000.00', 'sub_item value3': '727658.81', 'sub_item value4': '13279.60', 'sub_item value5': '243988.48'}}}
```
